name: good-way-travels
description: Good Way Travels & Online Services - Travel and Government Services Website

scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m 'Deploy updates' && git push origin main
scripts.build: echo 'No build process required for static HTML project. Project is ready to serve!'
scripts.test: echo 'Opening inquiry page for testing...' && (xdg-open inquiry.html || open inquiry.html || echo 'Please open inquiry.html in your browser')
scripts.students:add: echo 'Adding student record...' && echo 'Student management feature will be implemented here'
scripts.students:list: echo 'Listing students...' && echo 'Student list feature will be implemented here'
scripts.students:remove: echo 'Removing student record...' && echo 'Student removal feature will be implemented here'
scripts.help: echo 'Available commands:' && echo '  npm start       - Start development server' && echo '  npm run serve   - Start development server' && echo '  npm run deploy  - Deploy to GitHub' && echo '  npm run build   - Build project' && echo '  npm test        - Test application' && echo '  npm run students:add    - Add student' && echo '  npm run students:list   - List students' && echo '  npm run students:remove - Remove student'

author: Good Way Travels
